Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
everyone PLEASE READ: users who had assetchain funds swept to the safe address and used a refund address from an exchange since day 1, please DM me with the exact following details: 
```
- The ID you provided on the claim form
- The exchange address you used for your assetchain funds
- The new address that you want to receive your funds to (you must own the private key of this address)
```
Users who ONLY requested a KMD & BTC payout and provided an exchange address don't  DM me for changes.
